title: Legend.of.Sayuki.PAL.PS2DVD-VATOS
description:
RELEASE INFO

    RELEASE ...... Legend.of.Sayuki.PAL.PS2DVD-VATOS
    ORIGIN........ PAL
    PLATFORM ..... PS2
    LANGUAGES .... PAL

    RELEASE DATE . 2008-06-25
    SIZES ........ 1 x 50M
    SOURCE........ DVD

    GENRE ........ RPG
    PUBLISHER .... THQ


    GAME SUMMARY

    The sequel to the acclaimed SNES/arcade classic, Legend of Sayuki
    immerses players in a 2D multi-scrolling shoot &#039;em up world filled
    with Japanese folklore and monsters.

    You take the role of a Shinto shrine maiden called Sayo and her pet
    companion Konkon, a fox spirit. Each character has its own special
    moves including dash jumps, charge attacks and combo attacks for Sayo
    and Konkon has the fox fire move - the ability to shoot fireballs from
    his tail. Legend of Sayuki can be played in single player mode
    controlling Sayo or in two-player mode controlling Sayo and Konkon.


    NOTES

    at least english
